name: Peinmore House by Portree

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We could not fault this B&B at all. Lovely welcome, very big bedroom and huge bathroom. Not just instant coffee, but fresh grounds with a cafetiere in the room. There was plenty of choice for breakfast, and friendly smiles on the owners and the other guests. View of the black cullin from our room (5) was fantastic. We'd definitely stay here again.
reviews.title: Spacious, clean, friendly and amazing views!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My husband and I stayed 3 nights at Peinmore House in late May and it was the best B&B of our trip. Actually, we had talked with some of the other guests and we all agreed that it was the best B&B we had ever stayed in - anywhere! The bedrooms and bathrooms are huge!! Bed was good and food was great! They take good care of you there and make you feel at home! We will definitely be back!
reviews.title: Peinmore House is outstanding!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: They also have an art galley but our days were so packed that we did not get a chance to visit it.
reviews.title: What a find - a beautiful very upmarket B&B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A wonderful B&B in a beautiful location. The rooms are huge. The furnishings are oustanding. The beds are comfy. The views are superb. The breakfasts are the best ever and Margaret looks after everyone so well. I think I have run out of superlatives!!
reviews.title: Wonderful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Having previously visited Skye we had decided to spend some more time on this beautiful island. I searched Visit Scotland's four star B&Bs in Portree and Peinmore house immediately jumped off the page. We booked for three nights in May.
reviews.title: Luxurious B&B

likes.disliked: — Parking facilities were a bit limited - places for all, but quite tight

reviews.title: We loved it!
reviews.text: We stayed for four nights in Room no. 2 at Peinmore House. The room was great--very spacious. The en-suite bathroom was huge. Breakfast was very good. Location couldn't have been better.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This B&B just outside Portree is the perfect base to explore the Isle of Skye. Although not mentioned in the AA Guide, it certainly deserves its 5 star rating by the Scottish Tourist Board. Our room (2) was very spacious and clean with a magnificent view: “The Old Man of Storr”! Breakfast was really lovely: lots to choose from and the full English was delicious. We would definitely stay here again. Thank you, Margaret!
reviews.title: The Perfect Hideaway in Skye

reviews.text: The house is beautifully restored, many upgrades and amenties, and the owners are sophisticated, friendly and hospitable. The gallery shows first-rate artists.
reviews.title: Elegant and friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed in Peinmore for 3 nights on a trip to Skye. The house is beautifully decorated, they've obviously spent a lot of time and effort renovating this place. There seem to be great views from every window. The room (3) was large with a view of Cuillin's in the distance over the roof opposite. The room had a TV and DVD player with a large selection of DVD's downstairs to choose from. Breakfast was great with healthier options as well as the full cooked breakfast. Peinmore is a couple of miles outside Portree so you do have to drive to go out for dinner.
reviews.title: Fantastic Setting

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My wife and I stayed at Peinmore for 3 days in June (2009) and had a lovely time. This is truly a 5 star B&B. Margaret makes sure everything is perfect, including breakfast.
reviews.title: great stay at Peinmore House

reviews.text: We stayed here in September. There is nothing to fault really and everything lived up to expectations. Margaret & Don are great hosts and we received a warm welcome from them. The rooms are gorgeous - la very good size, ovely comfy beds, crisp bed linens and sofas. The bathrooms are also lovely - White Company products in them. It's the little touches that make the difference - DVD players in the room, DVD "library" downstairs - no charge for either of these. Fresh coffee as well as instant on the tea tray and chocolates on the pillow on the day of your arrival. Breakfasts are great - freshly cooked selection (which you choose the previous evening) as well as toast, fresh croissants, yoghurts, fruit salad etc. I would definitely recommend Peinmore and hope to return one day.
reviews.title: Fantastic place to stay!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: It was our first trip after wedding and the first time to Skye. The Peinmore house was really nice for honeymoon couple. Luxury room and facilities. We had nice memory there.
reviews.title: Really luxury and very good memory!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The breakfast was fantastic. Several choices from Scotish traditional breakfast to local smoky salmon. I especially liked the fresh fruit salad the house lady prepared. Definitely fresh fruits and home prepared.
reviews.title: Absolute luxury!

reviews.text: Room is luxury as mentioned and very clean as well. Love to stay there next time we go there again.
reviews.title: Great stay, lovely house

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The house is not near the high street of Portree. If you drive from Broadford, you will pass by a road to Braes. The house is on the way to Braes, which is a very nice part as well.
reviews.title: Just lovely

likes.liked: — Lovely spacious, comfortable room and great locatioin - remote enough to be quiet and peaceful but easily accessible to Portree for restaurants etc
likes.disliked: — It felt quite quiet and I did worry about making any noise when we returned home from our meal out

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I would definitely recommend this B&B to people staying in Skye. We stayed for one night en route to Uig for the ferry.
reviews.title: Beautiful B&B

likes.liked: — Large rooms and attention to detail

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Accommodation
reviews.title: Great B&B

reviews.text: The room we stayed in was gorgeous. Very spacious, light and clean. The bathroom was the biggest bathroom I have ever seen in my life - huge! We arrived late so I had a lovely bath and then straight to bed. It was so quiet, I had a fab nights sleep. The view from our room in the morning was lovely. I think it was room number 2.
reviews.title: Just perfect & best value for money!!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Location
reviews.title: The place to stay

reviews.text: It is a few miles out of Portree so not great if you want to have a few drinks and stumble home. But if you are planning on doing some walking in the area I couldn't think of a nicer place to come home to.
reviews.title: Most beautiful B&B I have ever stayed at!

aka: Peinmore House By Portree Hotel Portree
